attributes.action: Government to publicly confirm the NHS will not be privatised at any time.
attributes.additional_details: Protecting the NHS - the NHS needs protection from privatisation. It should not be allowed to be sold in parts or as a whole. If the government fails to clearly and concisely answer this question then a referendum should be  put to the people.
attributes.background: There is growing concern that the government is going to privatise the NHS by selling off some or all parts to companies who are profit driven. The NHS is healthcare for all and should remain in the public domain. It is the Jewel of the nation ensuring everyone has access to free healthcare.
